basics.name: Kiko Siqueira
basics.summary:
Versatile professional with over 12 years of experience in business analyses and adept at managing multiple projects, 
providing excellent team support and streamlining data explorations for major productivity gains. Committed to strengthening interdepartmental collaboration, promoting high documentation standards with full proficiency in self-service analytics.
